title: Deylam, Khuzestan
text: Deylam (; also known as Deylam-e Qadīm) is a village in <a href="Miyan%20Ab%20Rural%20District">Miyan Ab Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Shushtar%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Shushtar%20County">Shushtar County</a>, <a href="Khuzestan%20Province">Khuzestan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 1,058, in 189 families.
